channelInfo.title: Let's Make Education Simple
channelInfo.description:
This channel aims to simplify your understanding of 'seemingly' complex science/Maths/Engineering/technology concepts through practical, day-to-day applications. All our content is in Tamil language. 

Our mission is to provide world-class content that makes learning science, simple & fun! ;)

videos.title: Russia வின் தடுப்பூசி பாதுகாப்பானதா? | Coronavirus | LMES
videos.description:
Russia has claimed that it invented the vaccine for the ongoing pandemic crisis. And Russian President Putin himself announced that the vaccine was tested on his own child and she was perfectly alright!  Normally it would take at least 7 to 10 years to create a vaccine, so is this new Russian vaccine safe to use? Know more about this Russian Vaccine from the video!

Reference links:

https://www.who.int/blueprint/priority-diseases/key-action/novel-coronavirus-landscape-ncov.pdf
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Viral_vector#Adenoviruses
https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/medicine-and-dentistry/adenovirus-vector
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4994731/
https://sputnikvaccine.com/
https://www.cnbctv18.com/healthcare/explained-is-russias-covid-19-vaccine-sputnik-v-ready-and-safe-6643071.html
https://swarajyamag.com/science/russias-sputnik-v-covid-19-vaccine-how-they-did-it

videos.title: Why does Table and Ceiling fan rotates in Opposite Direction? | Unnoticed #20 | Tamil | LMES
videos.description:
In this episode, Arvind explains about the direction of rotation in table and ceiling fans. Even though, we know that Single-phase AC induction motor is common in both the fans, there is some difference which makes the fan to rotate clockwise in table fans and anticlockwise in ceiling fans. To know in detail, watch the full video.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

videos.title: Why do newspapers print these four colour dots? | Unnoticed#19 | LMES
videos.description:
Have you ever wondered why there are four coloured dots at the bottom of newspapers! Those dots were used to quality check the print of newspapers effectively using sensor devices. Know in details about it by watching the full video.

videos.title: A way to save corona patients from death! | Coronavirus | Tamil | LMES
videos.description:
People who have recovered from Corona can donate their plasma after 14 days from recovery, which would help people with weak immunity recover against corona. You can donate your Plasma at Rajiv Gandhi Medical Hospital Plasma Bank, Chennai.  Till now only 76 Plasma has been donated in Chennai which saved 89 people from Corona, think how many lives can be saved if more plasmas were donated! so pls share this video among your friends and families to spread this awareness.
